_aLatestUpdates._sText:
http://store.steampowered.com/news/13353/

>Product Update - Valve
>01:57
>Updates to Team Fortress 2, Counter-Strike: Source, Day of Defeat: Source >and Half-Life 2: Deathmatch have been released. The updates will be >applied automatically. The major changes include:
>
>
> Source Engine Changes (CS:S, DoD:S, TF2, HL2:DM)
>
>    Fixed the skybox on 3rd party maps when using certain sky materials
Ok, you get this skybox error when you compile your map using HDR settings and one of skybox materials what I have listed/mention.

_sName: Skybox error in HDR compiled maps
_sText:
*edit
Has been fixed, no longer needed!
http://store.steampowered.com/news/13353/

Seems this skybox error happen when you compile your map using HDR setting!

Old maps what have been compiled with the skybox materials,
which have later updated to support HDR skybox materials,
will show as error.

This error not happen when compile map with same texture today!

These are faulty materials inside ...hl2/hl2\_misc\_*.vpk
Those non-hdr files are using wrong input "sky" instead "unlitgeneric" 
sky_day01_01
sky_day01_04
sky_day01_05
sky_day01_06
sky_day01_08
sky_day01_09
sky_day02_01
sky_day02_02
sky_day03_01
This is error what happens on old maps, like in cs:s map de\_westwood 
Requesting texture value from var "$hdrbasetexture" which is not a texture value (material: skybox/sky_day01_06rt)
Requesting texture value from var "$hdrbasetexture" which is not a texture value (material: skybox/sky_day01_06rt)
Requesting texture value from var "$hdrbasetexture" which is not a texture value (material: skybox/sky_day01_06rt)
Requesting texture value from var "$hdrbasetexture" which is not a texture value (material: skybox/sky_day01_06rt)
Requesting texture value from var "$hdrbasetexture" which is not a texture value (material: skybox/sky_day01_06rt)
Requesting texture value from var "$hdrbasetexture" which is not a texture value (material: skybox/sky_day01_06rt)
Requesting texture value from var "$hdrbasetexture" which is not a texture value (material: skybox/sky_day01_06rt)
Requesting texture value from var "$hdrbasetexture" which is not a texture value (material: skybox/sky_day01_06rt)
Requesting texture value from var "$hdrbasetexture" which is not a texture value (material: skybox/sky_day01_06bk)
Requesting texture value from var "$hdrbasetexture" which is not a texture value (material: skybox/sky_day01_06bk)
Here are fixed skybox files
Only for clients, servers not do anything with these !
add in ...cstrike/custom/
should look ...cstrike\custom\skybox\_error\_fix\materials\skybox\



Server with sv\_pure 1 mode could add in ...cstrike/cfg/pure\_server\_whitelist.txt 
	materials\skybox\...			any
